bonus.value: If HP is less than 30% after being attacked, gain a shield equal to 20%/26%/32%/40% of Max HP for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds.
During the effect of the shield, restore HP equal to 60%/75%/90%/105% of the damage dealt. The max HP restored every 0.5 seconds should not exceed 105%/127.5%/150%/172.5% of ATK.
